org.hackystat.sensorbase.uricache
Class TestUriCacheManagerConcurrentCacheRequest

java.lang.Object
  org.hackystat.sensorbase.uricache.TestUriCacheManagerConcurrentCacheRequest

public class TestUriCacheManagerConcurrentCacheRequest
extends java.lang.Object

Tests CacheManager functionality in the sense of the concurrent access for the cache data.

Author:
Pavel Senin.

Constructor Summary
TestUriCacheManagerConcurrentCacheRequest()
           
 
Method Summary
 void setUp()
          Before each test we are setting up one cache instance, putting put some data in and shutting in down.
 void tearDown()
          Tears down test environment and clears all leftovers.
 void testSecondInstance()
          Now we are getting back the only instance of cache from the storage and trying to create another instance of the UriCache for the same user email and host.
 void testSecondInstanceAndCleanUp()
          Now we are getting back the only instance of cache from the storage, creating four new instances, shutting down three of them and testing obtaining if the very last cache and cleanup.

clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

testSecondInstance

public void testSecondInstance()
                        throws org.hackystat.utilities.uricache.UriCacheException,
                               java.io.IOException,
                               java.lang.InterruptedException
Now we are getting back the only instance of cache from the storage and trying to create another instance of the UriCache for the same user email and host.

Throws:
org.hackystat.utilities.uricache.UriCacheException - in the case of error.
java.io.IOException - if IO error occurs.
java.lang.InterruptedException - if unable to sleep in thread.

testSecondInstanceAndCleanUp

public void testSecondInstanceAndCleanUp()
                                  throws org.hackystat.utilities.uricache.UriCacheException,
                                         java.io.IOException,
                                         java.lang.InterruptedException
Now we are getting back the only instance of cache from the storage, creating four new instances, shutting down three of them and testing obtaining if the very last cache and cleanup.

Throws:
org.hackystat.utilities.uricache.UriCacheException - in the case of error.
java.io.IOException - if IO error occurs.
java.lang.InterruptedException - if unable to sleep in thread.
